Name: Running Riot
About the game: Enter the Running Riot gauntlet, where you'll engage in heart-pounding twin-stick combat against enemies trying to take you down! Devastating Abilities You're no pushover. You'll gain Surges as you level up, making your abilities stronger. Your choices will determine whether victory will be yours! Customizable Classes Each class comes with its own set of unique abilities, strengths, and meta-progression perks. Classes present new playstyles to master and new opportunities to nail that perfect run . More classes are in development! Epic Gauntlet Rooms full of enemies and traps stand between you and ultimate victory. Your path is your own as you blast your way through gritty alleys, high-tech laboratories, and desolate ruins. Complete sub-objectives to further enhance your loadout, and who knows? You just might make it . Meta-progression (In Development) Each run grants you Running Riot Tickets that you can spend on unlocking new things to play with. We're talking abilities, class perks, prizes, new classes, and upgrades! So keep on running , keep on rioting , and you'll keep on finding more explosive ways to play!
